description: You would never expect a girl as cute and innocent looking as Ami Emerson to crave rough sex and bondage. She takes as much as James Deen dishes out and loves it. Ami is extremely ticklish and losses all control when James gets her sweet spot. Also, a scene with multiple clamps all over her body and a split leg tie with hot wax take her right to the edge of endurance.
title: Ami Emerson
